changeSet.author: David Kirakosyan
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_profiles ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(255), last_name VARCHAR(255), patronymic VARCHAR(255), birth_date DATE, gender user_profile_gender DEFAULT 'OTHER' NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(500), photo_url VARCHAR(500), nationality VARCHAR(100), citizenship VARCHAR(100), timezone VARCHAR(100), preferred_language VARCHAR(100), CONSTRAINT fk_user_profiles_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
